name: Guerrilla Media
tagline: UI & UX oriented mobile app developers
description:
Guerrilla Media is a mobile and interactive design agency. We are not your everyday "big" company. We are boutique by design and we like it that way since this allows us to offer clients a distinctly personal level of service. We are a team of digital creatives with extensive experience in graphic, web and mobile application design and development.
In addressing our clientsâ€™ communication needs, our focus is on clear design with solid technical realisation in producing bespoke creative solutions that inspire, inform and interact.
